data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in San Lorenzo, Puerto Rico to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Lorenzo, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to San Lorenzo, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call San Lorenzo, Puerto Rico into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 11,705 believers in San Lorenzo to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Jagual
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Jagual, San Lorenzo, Puerto Rico.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in San Lorenzo, Puerto Rico to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 11,705 believers in the state of San Lorenzo to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Jesus, please give the apostles in San Lorenzo, Puerto Rico a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
